welcomepage.welcomeDescription: Competent planning is an integral part of our life. Whether it is an apartment renovation, a birthday party or a project at work, it is always important to have a clear structure of the workflow for a more successful implementation of any event. That is why the task manager is an indispensable tool for daily task planning. Why do I need a task manager? It will simplify the workflow, make it more transparent, and help plan and monitor the implementation of projects from a variety of professional fields.

developers.iraDevDesc: I've been learning Front-end for a year. Before that I was far from coding, but I am aimed at switching my career. I am sure that I will manage.
developers.yuliaDevDesc: Hello! I'm Yulia - a Frontend Developer with almost 1 year of practical experience. Interested in working with inspirational people, creating new contemporary projects, learning IT technologies. Find out more about me on
